header_text: About Pacing for Pain and Fatigue

elements.Text: So what is pacing? Pacing is a strategy that can be used in order to break down your activities and tasks  into smaller and more manageable portions. The goal of pacing is to engage in activities in a set amount of time while taking regular breaks. Then, you gradually increase the amount of time spent on the activity over time. This gradual increase in activity over time can help to increase your tolerance and prevent periods of overactivity.
